Open the Algorand app on your Ledger. Make sure Bluetooth is enabled on your smartphone. Bluetooth is enabled. All Verified Assets
What does Asset Verification mean? Assets that go through our verification process are known projects that have their website and public information verified against this specific ASA. Verification status is not an endorsement of the asset. Pera Wallet does not have any relationship with verified ASA owners. This badge is for informational purposes only. That being said, you should always double check that the asset\'s ID is the one that you intended to choose before transacting with that asset. If you have questions about the verification process or general feedback about the app, we encourage you to visit; Advanced Troubleshooting Connecting to Ledger… Ledger Approval
For general usage of your Ledger\'s Bluetooth feature, please refer to Ledger\'s official Bluetooth Connection Guide.
For more advanced troubleshooting, please refer to Ledger\'s official Bluetooth Troubleshooting Guide.
Begin by following Ledger\'s comprehensive Getting Started tutorial.
When the tutorial gets to the point where it directs you to \"select the application(s) you want to install on your device,\" type Algorand in the search bar and install. Continue with Ledger\'s Getting Started tutorial, which will direct you how to install and open apps on your ledger device. If you haven\'t already installed the Algorand app on your Ledger device, when the tutorial gets to the point where it directs you to \"Select the application(s) you want to install on your device,\" type Algorand in the search bar and install. Connection Error Could not connect to the Ledger device. Make sure the device is unlocked, nearby and has bluetooth enabled. Ledger Connection Error Please open the Algorand App on your ledger device. Bluetooth Error Bluetooth must be enabled on your device in order to search for nearby Ledger devices. Permission Denied Location permission needs to be granted in order to search nearby Ledgers. Bluetooth scan permission needs to be granted in order to search nearby Ledgers. Transmission Error We were unable to send the transaction to the ledger device. Please try again. We were unable to receive the public key of your ledger device. Please try again. Transaction Cancelled The paired ledger device has cancelled the transaction request. Unsupported Device The device you are trying to connect to is not supported with the Pera Wallet. Bluetooth Location Services Error Please ensure that location services are enabled. Continue When sending to an address for the first time, it\'s useful to send a small test transaction before sending a large amount. Exchanges change their deposit addresses frequently, and saved exchange addresses may no longer be in use. Ensure you\'re sending to the correct address. For more information on transacting, tap here I Understand The transaction cannot be completed because the amount will put your account below minimum required balance of min_balance_placeholder Algo. Recovery Passphrase Select word #wordNumberPlaceholder Create a passphrase backup for your account Creating a passphrase backup will allow you to recover your account. Without the passphrase, if you lose your device, remove the account or delete the app, you can permanently lose access to your Algorand account! Prepare to write down your recovery passphrase The only way to recover an Algorand account is with this recovery passphrase. I\'m Ready to Begin Create a Watch Account Recover an Algorand account In the following steps, you\'ll enter your 25-word recovery passphrase to recover an Algorand account. Have your recovery phrase handy before you begin. Finish Account Creation Welcome to\nPera Wallet I want to monitor an account that\'s held in cold storage. Recover The last copied text is not valid passphrase with 25 words. Please copy valid passphrase and try again. Make sure to record these words in the correct order, using the corresponding numbers. This 6-digit PIN will be required to use the Pera Wallet. We highly recommend creating a PIN to help increase wallet security in the event your phone is stolen. transaction_count_placeholder Txns · Group ID: group_id_placeholder Transaction Request Rejected: The User has rejected the transaction request. Transaction Request Rejected: The transaction group has failed validation by the Algorand SDK. Transaction Request Rejected: The User currently has another transaction request that is in progress. Signing Error: Network mismatch between dApp and Wallet. For example, Wallet is connected to TestNet and dApp connected to MainNet (or vice versa). Signing Error: A transaction in the transaction request requires a private key (signer) that does not exist in the connected Wallet. The transaction request contains an Unsupported Transaction Type The transaction request contains an Unsupported Transaction Type: Multi-sig Invalid Input: Transaction request contains more than %1$d transactions Invalid Input: Unable to parse transaction Invalid Input: Invalid Public Key Invalid Input: Invalid Asset Invalid Input: Unable to be signed Invalid Input: Group transaction does not need to be signed by Wallet user. Invalid Input: The requested signer is not in the User Wallet Pairing Ledger with Your Device Open your Ledger device. Close the Algorand app on the Ledger device. On the Ledger home screen, confirm pairing. Pairing failed! Having Ledger Nano X connection issues? Make sure the device is unlocked, nearby and has bluetooth enabled. If problems persist, please remove the device from your phone\'s bluetooth settings, remove the ledger account, and then re-pair your Ledger following the Pera Wallet instructions. Since some asset values are not available, the Total Portfolio Value should be considered an estimation. Undefined We notice that this is your first transaction. Scan an Algorand\nAddress QR Code Current\nBalance Based on your account configuration, your minimum balance is %1$s. By hitting continue, your transaction amount will be updated to maintain the Algorand Blockchain\'s minimum required balance. You\'ll be able to preview this change in the next steps. Sending your maximum balance on this rekeyed account requires you to maintain a minimum balance of min_balance_placeholder Algo. This is to ensure that nothing changes with your rekeyed account. \n \n Your transaction amount will be automatically updated to reflect this change. You will be able to preview the transaction in the next steps. Show Note Loading
We are very excited to announce that Algorand Wallet is now called Pera Wallet. This is much more than a new name and logo. We are relaunching the most popular wallet in the Algorand ecosystem with a renewed focus on our roadmap, partner integrations, and community.\n\nDon\'t worry, Pera Wallet is built and maintained by the same team and all the features you know and love are still here as usual – With many more to come in the upcoming months.\n\nTo read more about the relaunch and our roadmap, head over to the Pera Wallet blog
Sorry, we can\'t show the details of this account. Sorry, we can\'t show the details of this portfolio. It looks like we are having issues for the calculation.\n\nPlease note that some asset values might not be available, therefore the total portfolio value should be considered an estimation.
Transaction Request FAQ External applications, also called dApps, can initiate transaction requests independently from Pera Wallet. Please ensure you review these transactions carefully before approving and signing them.\n\nAll transactions are irreversible. As these requests are outside Pera Wallet\'s control, never approve transactions from a dApp you don\'t know. Minimum Amount Required This is the first transaction for the selected account. The first transactions require a minimum amount of at least 0.1 Algo. Please enter a valid amount and try again. ASA Verification Pera Wallet\'s Algorand Standard Asset (ASA) Verification Program allows ASA creators to get automatically verified by validating that they are the owners of the asset. The main purpose of ASA Verification is to prevent an ASA from pretending to be affiliated with and acting as the token for a project it\'s not connected to. ASA Verification is not an endorsement of the project. Neither Algorand nor Pera would ever use the verification process to endorse a project.

The Algo is the official cryptocurrency of the Algorand blockchain. The Algorand blockchain has been built to help create an open, borderless economy where everybody can participate. This new type of digital economy can only run on a truly digital currency that works instantly, for everybody. This is the Algo. %1$s successfully removed to your account. Swap Convert between popular ASA pairs
Swap To Swap From We can\'t show assets right now. Please try again. Choose an asset Balance: %1$s
Select an account to make the swap Price impact is the influence of your trade over the market price of the asset pair. It is directly correlated with the amount of liquidity in the pool. Slippage Tolerance Slippage is the price difference between when you submit a transaction and when the transaction is confirmed on the blockchain. If slippage rate goes over the tolerance percentage you set here, transaction will be cancelled automatically to protect you from value loss. Swap in Pera Pera Wallet now provides an easy and fast way to swap assets. Try Swap Later
Set custom slippage Auto Balance percentage must be between %1$d%% and %2$d%% Set custom percentage Balance Percentage Pera Wallet provides an easy and fast way to swap assets. Swapping allows an ASA to be exchanged with another one using a smart contract, at market fees. By continuing, you agree to our\nswap partner\'s Terms of Service Start Swapping Powered by New

This is the fee charged to you by the decentralized exchange. It\'s automatically deducted from the amount you send and factored into the minimum received amount. Min Balance %1$s Minimum balance is the minimum amount of Algo you have to keep in an account. It increases every time the account is opted in to a smart contract, ASA or NFT.

Import from Pera Web I want to import Algorand accounts from Pera Web
Get your QR ready on Pera Web Go to \"web.perawallet.app\" on your desktop Go to Settings > Transfer Accounts Select the accounts you want to import to Pera Mobile and generate your QR Tap Start to scan the QR Scan QR code\non Pera Web Start

It appears that you are trying to confirm a Swap with a Price impact greater than priceImpactPercentagePlaceholder%.\n\nTo learn more about Price impact, how it is calculated or how it can affect your swap\'s overall value, please visit Tinyman\'s FAQ section. Please ensure the authorising account is added to your wallet, and if it is a Ledger account ensure it is correctly connected. Caution! Price impact is greater than priceImpactPercentagePlaceholder%, meaning there might be low liquidity with this pool. Please make sure you understand the consequences before confirming the swap. WalletConnect Advanced Permissions WalletConnect is a communications protocol for web3, enabling wallets and dApps to securely connect and interact. With each new version, WalletConnect introduces new ways to handle, sign and/or display transaction requests coming from third party projects. Extend

Transaction request rejected: the user has rejected the transaction request. Missing transaction(s): this transaction request is missing one or more transactions. For your own safety, Pera Wallet won\'t allow you to sign requests that do not display the complete transaction group. To rectify this issue, please contact the dApp. Transaction request pending: the user currently has another transaction request in progress. Network mismatch error: this dApp and Pera Wallet are currently operating on different networks. Please make sure that they both run on either Mainnet or Testnet. Missing private key(s): Pera Wallet is missing one or more private keys, needed to sign the transaction request. Unsupported transaction type: this transaction request contains one or more unsupported transaction types. Multi-sig required: this transaction request requires a multisig type signature, currently unsupported by Pera Wallet. Transaction limit: this transaction request contains %1$d transactions, exceeding Pera Wallet transactions limit. Arbirary Data limit: this arbitrary data request contains %1$d arbitrary data, exceeding Pera Wallet arbirary data limit. Invalid request format: Pera Wallet is unable to parse the transaction request. Invalid request format: Pera Wallet is unable to parse the arbitrary data request. Invalid public key(s): the transaction request contains one or more invalid account addresses. Invalid asset ID: the transaction request contains one or more invalid asset ID. Invalid input: Pera Wallet is unable to sign the transaction request. Transaction group is missing signer account(s): Pera Wallet is missing the necessary accounts to sign one or more transaction groups in the transaction request. Missing signer account(s): Pera Wallet is missing one or more accounts needed to sign the transaction request. Unauthorized WC_Method: the connected session does not have permission to sign transaction requests with Method type: %1$s. Unauthorized WC_Event: the connected session does not have permission to sign transaction requests with Event type: %1$s. Unauthorized WC_Chain: the connected session does not have permission to sign transaction requests in: %1$s. User_Rejected_Chain: this dApp is trying to connect to your account on %1$s, but Pera Wallet is set on %2$s. Unsupported Blockchain: Pera Wallet currently supports only the Algorand blockchain. Unsupported WC_Method: Pera Wallet currently does not support one or more of the WalletConnect Methods requested by this dApp. Unsupported WC_Events: Pera Wallet currently does not support one or more of the WalletConnect Events requested by this dApp. Pera Wallet couldn\'t locate the WalletConnect session used by this dApp. Please disconnect and try again. %1$s account
Rekeyed to Your account is a standard Algorand account. It has not been rekeyed and it is not associated with a Ledger device. It was added to your wallet with its keys. Learn more Your account is a Ledger account. It was added to your wallet directly from the hardware device. All transactions for this account must be confirmed on your Ledger. Learn more This account was not added to your wallet with its keys. It is read-only and cannot interact with other accounts or authorize transactions. Your account doesn’t have any Auth information. You can\'t send assets or sign transactions. Learn more Your account is rekeyed to an Algorand account that is not in your wallet. You can\'t send assets or sign transactions. Learn more Your account is rekeyed to another standard Algorand account. Transactions for this account will be authorized by the other account. Learn more Your account is rekeyed to an Algorand account that is not in your wallet. You can\'t send assets or sign transactions. Learn more Your account is rekeyed to another standard Algorand account. Transactions for this account will be authorized by the other account. Learn more * No record of original account type found\n\nYour account is rekeyed to an account on a Ledger hardware device. Transactions for this account must be authorized on the Ledger device.
